dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3567517Y] Copyright violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2007 12:01 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3567517Y] Copyright violation

For your review.

-
Regards
Steve
Abuse Department
The Planet    
Creating a Better World for Your Business. 





==== Original Message ====
1. Copyright violation

QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED

 (multipart/alternative) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Subject: 
 
Notification of Copyright Violation - Digital Millennium Copyright Act,  
17  
USC 512(c)(3) and Violation of Terms of Service Agreement; 
 
 
From: 
Christopher McIntosh 
Address: Carl-Friedrich-Gauss-Strasse 51, 28357 Bremen, Germany. 
Email: mcintoshofbremen@yahoo.de 
Telephone: +49 (0) 421 244 0413. Work telephone: +49 (0) 40 44 80 41 21 
 
Date: 21 March 2007 
 
NS1.EV1SERVERS.NET 
 
Abuse Department 
Everyones Internet 
390 Benmar 
Suite 200 
Houston 
TX 77060 USA 
RAbusePhone:  +1-713-579-2850 
RAbuseEmail:  abuse@ev1servers.net 
 
WITHOUT PREJUDICE 
 
Re: Complaint - 
 
Copyright Infringement and Violation of your terms of service  
agreement. 
 
   
Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
This is to report a violation of your terms of service agreement with  
your users in the form of copyright infringement. 
 
This is to give formal written notice to your organization that one of  
your users, 
 
Mr Piers Vaughan 
29 Benmore Terrace, 
Bayonne, 
New Jersey 07002 
(tel:+1.12018581564, 
piersvaughan@hotmail.com 
 
on Domain ID:D78824483-LROR, Domain Name:MOUP.ORG) has used your  
services to abuse copyright. 
 
The following work is infringed by him:  
http://www.moup.org/Files/Rosicrucian-McIntosh.pdf. 
 
I declare, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this  
notification is true and accurate, and that I am author and the owner  
of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed (this infringing  
publication even identifies me as such) , that I have a good faith belief that use  
of the disputed material is not authorized by myself (the copyright  
owner), any agent, or by the law. 
 
The above information demonstrates that Mr Vaughan is in violation of  
your user agreements and infringes my copyright. 
 
This complaint adheres to the prescribed form for notification of an  
alleged copyright violation as set forth in the Digital Millennium Copyright  
Act, 17 USC 512(c)(3). 
 
Your immediate advice on what action you intend to take in this matter  
would be appreciated. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Christopher McIntosh
